pkmkdoc.description: The Windows Azure SDK for OS X adds the powerful azure command line interface for interacting with, publishing, and building open source applications for Windows Azure.

choice.title: Node.js Independent Binary
choice.description: The Windows Azure SDK includes an independent binary of Node.js that is installed outside the path.

locale.resource: resources/Windows Azure Deployment Tools Pre-release License_LCA 5 17 2012.rtf

\f0\fs26 \cf0 Thanks for installing the Windows Azure SDK for Mac.\ \ To get started, just type `azure` in a new Terminal window.\ \ If you need to ever install, type `azure-uninstall` from a Terminal window.\ \ Please make sure that /usr/local/bin/ is in your $PATH.\ \ Thanks,\ The Windows Azure Team\ @windowsazure}

requirement.message: The Windows Azure SDK requires at least operating system version 10.6.7.
